attributes.action: Finsbury Park Station: Wells Terrace Exit Signs
attributes.additional_details: We, local business managers, residents and visitors to Finsbury Park, petition Transport for London to amend the Way Out signs in Finsbury Park station, to clarify that there is no route to Wells Terrace via the 'Way Out - National Rail' exit from the underground platforms.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
